mapper.insert: insert into t_news_words (id, webid, content, count, today_count, hotday, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{webid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{todayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_news_words set webid = #{webid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, today_count = #{todayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hotday = #{hotday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, webid, content, count, today_count, hotday, create_time from t_news_words
